name: UpRooted (RootaBetaGames, keastarino)
description:
UpRooted

A virus rewires the frayed roots of the forest, overwriting flora, glitching fauna, and changing the code of nature itself. Forest's mage Anaiah enlists the help of paladin Finn to hack the corruption rotting the Core. The pair must learn to work together, harvest The Additive, and reboot the Core to its natural state. 

Play as Two Fight as One

Explore Anaiah and Finn's dynamic as you switch between a mid-ranged mage and a close-combat paladin.

Never Fight Alone

Though things feel bleak, there's still someone ready to fight by your side!

Navigate Nature's Obstacles

Slash through twisted roots and restore energy to flowers as you work through the forest.

Master the Elements

Harness the elements of Control, Stability, and Power as you search for The Additive.

Discover a Pixilated Digital Forest

Venture through a unique and detailed world of nature and neon in this techno-nature world. Here, technology is nature, with energy running through the roots of the forest.
